typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		createdby as string,
		createdbyname as string,
		createdbyyominame as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		createdonbehalfby as string,
		createdonbehalfbyname as string,
		createdonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		importsequencenumber as integer,
		mc2_bloque as string,
		mc2_maestro_bloqueid as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		modifiedbyname as string,
		modifiedbyyominame as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyname as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		overriddencreatedon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		owneridname as string,
		owneridtype as string,
		owneridyominame as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		owningbusinessunitname as string,
		owningteam as string,
		owninguser as string,
		statecode as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as integer,
		utcconversiontimezonecode as integer,
		versionnumber as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	container: 'mc2-bs-golden',
	folderPath: '2021/12',
	fileName: '20211213-mc2_maestro_bloque.parquet',
	compressionCodec: 'snappy') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		e3c_categoria_producto as string,
		e3c_categoria_productoname as string,
		e3c_centro_gestorname as string,
		e3c_enviado_sap as boolean,

		e3c_url_carpeta_sharepoint_tr as string,

		e3c_pedidosap as string,
		e3c_revisor_expname as string,
		e3c_solicitante_ordinarianame as string,
		e3c_tipo_imputacion as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		statecode as decimal(38,0),
		owninguser as string,
		createdby as string,
		createdonbehalfby as string,
		e3c_aprobacion_compra as boolean,
		e3c_centro_gestor as string,
		e3c_contrato as string,
		e3c_fecha_inicio_tr as timestamp,
		e3c_grupo_compras as string,
		e3c_area_funcional as string,
		importsequencenumber as decimal(38,0),
		utcconversiontimezonecode as decimal(38,0),
		e3c_num_pedido_cliente as string,
		e3c_fecha_fin_tr as timestamp,
		e3c_grupo_comprasname as string,
		e3c_moneda_tr as string,
		e3c_nota_tramitacion as string,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		owneridname as string,
		e3c_estado_cesta_ordinaria as string,
		e3c_gasto_inversionname as string,
		e3c_precio_bruto as string,
		e3c_proveedor_tr as string,
		e3c_proyecto_tr as string,
		e3c_area_funcionalname as string,
		e3c_cliente_tr as string,
		e3c_dest_mercanciasname as string,
		e3c_fecha_contabilizacion as timestamp,
		e3c_org_compras as string,
		e3c_solicitante_derivadaname as string,
		modifiedbyname as string,
		e3c_nombre_cesta as string,
		owningbusinessunitname as string,
		statuscode as decimal(38,0),
		e3c_ap_tr as string,
		e3c_contratoname as string,
		e3c_descripcion_proyecto_tr as string,
		e3c_importe_total_tr as string,
		e3c_status_ariba as string,
		e3c_tipo_facturacion_tr as string,
		owneridtype as string,
		e3c_fecha_entrega_tr as timestamp,
		e3c_nota_aprobacion as string,
		e3c_sociedadname as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyname as string,
		ownerid as string,
		e3c_gasto_inversion as string,
		createdbyname as string,
		e3c_cestasid as string,
		e3c_contrato_tr as string,
		e3c_centro as string,
		modifiedbyyominame as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		owneridyominame as string,

		timezoneruleversionnumber as decimal(38,0),

		e3c_tipo_compra as string,
		createdonbehalfbyname as string,

		e3c_elemento_pep_tr as string,
		e3c_estado_cesta_derivadaname as string,
		e3c_sociedad as string,
		createdbyyominame as string,
		e3c_solicitante_derivada as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		e3c_status_aribaname as string,
		e3c_pedido as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		createdonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		e3c_cantidad_base_ordinaria as string,
		e3c_estado_cesta_derivada as string,
		e3c_tipo_imputacionname as string,
		e3c_estado_cesta_ordinarianame as string,
		e3c_fecha_sap as timestamp,

		modifiedon as timestamp,
		overriddencreatedon as timestamp,
		versionnumber as decimal(38,0),

	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,

	upsertable:false,
